summary:
A simple crafting mod that adds the same recipes for arrowcrafting as it is in Dawnguard.
There is also an added NPC-Vendor in The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Sdhgdlb.png[/img]
This mods adds the same recipes as in Dawnguard to vanilla Skyrim, for example if you have the steelsmithing perk you can craft steel arrows in a forge if you have the right materials.


[b]Iron Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 iron ingot, 1 firewood = 24 Iron Arrows.[/color]
[b]Steel Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 steel ingot, 1 firewood = 24 Steel Arrows.[/color]
[b]Elven Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 refined moonstone, 1 firewood = 24 Elven Arrows.[/color]
[b]Dwarven Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 dwarven metal ingot, 1 firewood = 24 Dwarven Arrows.[/color]
[b]Orcish Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 orichalcum ingot, 1 firewood = 24 Orcish Arrows.[/color]
[b]Glass Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 malachite ingot, 1 firewood = 24 Glass Arrows.[/color]
[b]Ebony Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 ebony ingot, 1 firewood = 24 Ebony Arrows.[/color]
[b]Daedric Arrows:[/b][color=grey] 1 ebony ingot, 1 firewood, 1 daedra heart = 40 Daedric Arrows.[/color]

We have also added a vendor named Kah\' Liinh, in The Drunken Huntman in Whiterun, she will be updated shortly but for now she sells arrows depending on your level. Be sure to check her out!

Future updates will come if we get a good response from this simple mod!

[b]Happy crafting![/b]

/ Skapells
author: SkapalmMods

files.name: Simple Arrowcrafting
files.changelogHtml: Number of arrows you get when crafting is now set to 24 for all arrows except Daedric, they are set to 40.
